name: Sleepy Nights
description: A Vs Code theme thats for those of us who like to code at night, with warm colors and less contrast, so it's easy on the eys plus works really well with low brightness.

name: KastQL
description: A full fledged GraphQL engine, with a very dev friendly setup and an awesome cli tool.

name: commit-better
description: A cli tool to generate a commit message, to make commit messages more descriptive and meaningful.

name: Wave Runner
description: An Android/Pc game built with C# & Unity Engine, about dodging obstacles and collecting points.

name: TGP
description: Node cli tool that quickly sets up a Typescript based GraphQl server which uses Apollo for GraphQl and Prisma as orm.

name: SJ-server-client
description: A cli tool to create a basic express and react template, folder structure for beginners.

name: Issue-Tracker
description: A graphql based issue tracking web application. Built with SSR-React, GraphQl, Express.
